# replaceChild(at:with:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces a child at a particular index with another child.

## Declaration

```swift
func replaceChild(at index: Int, with node: XMLNode)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: An integer identifying the position of a node in the receiver’s list of child nodes.
- **node**: An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode] object to replace the object at `index`.

## Discussion

The replaced child node is released.

## Manipulating Child Nodes

- **addChild(_:)**: Adds a child node to the end of the list of existing children.
- **insertChild(_:at:)**: Inserts a child node in the receiver’s list of children at a specific location in the list.
- **insertChildren(_:at:)**: Inserts an array of child nodes at a specified location in the receiver’s list of children.
- **removeChild(at:)**: Removes the child node at a particular location in the receiver’s list of children.
- **setChildren(_:)**: Removes all existing children of the receiver and replaces them with an array of new child nodes.
